subject: Football
Suicides and Suicide Attempts
Suits and Litigation
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
Brain
lead_paragraph: The star linebacker was 43 when he killed himself; the family accuses the N.F.L. of hiding information about the link between head hits and cognitive issues.
